Hello.

I'm Kai Huang, a product designer and developer who's focused on using technology to bring good, thoughtful solutions to the world.

I design and develop apps for both mobile and desktop. Helping companies achieve their goals using technology is what gets me out of bed in the morning. Currently, I'm a UX/UI designer at CareerBuilder, where we create human resources software for enterprise clients. I'm also the Co-Founder and Chief Product Officer of Poqeta, Inc. Our software tackles the integration of technology into retail spaces.
